originalText.text: I hardly ever leave reviews but this place is definitely worth taking my time! I got Shalo as my waxer and she was the sweetest! Itâ€™s my first time waxing in the city (just moved in) and it was the most painless and the quickest Brazilian wax Iâ€™ve ever experienced! On top of that price is incredibly reasonable for NYC. Would definitely recommend to family and friends! Definitely become a regular

originalText.text: Terrible service and rude staff. I came here for a head massage with hot oil. Came here as a recommendation from a friend who has come here multiple times. I called earlier if I was able to come in when the salon was less busy and was given a time of around 6:30-6:45pm. I came in on time and brought my own oil. The service board said it was a hot head oil massage and I asked the woman why she didnâ€™t heat up the oil and she said thatâ€™s not how I do it. And then then proceeded to do a rushed massage barely 5 mins. My friend had come in and her massage was 15 mins. When I told her that the massage was rushed she proceeded to say everyone does different massage and when I told her she didnâ€™t even oil the back of my head she said that was not included. Completely false advertising and extremely unprofessional and rude staff. I only came here because of a recommendation and had such an unpleasant experience.

originalText.text: Iâ€™ve had my eyebrows come out uneven on multiple occasions. Once the front half of my right eyebrow was cut off way more than that of my left and it took months to grow back. This time my left one is longer than my right one and my right brow is thicker than the left. Theyâ€™re completely different shapes now and no idea how long it will take to fix it this time. Multiple awful experiences and will not be going back again.
